Name: Soldier of Reboldoeux
Introduction: A soldier responsible for the security in the City of Reboldoeux. He uses Sword and Polearm stances like those of Fighters.

Name: Idge Imbrulia
Introduction: Idge, Enhance Merchant of Cite de Reboldoeux. She was once simply an average woman, but was attracted by the exploration on the New Continent. She began enhancing armor after witnessing a person gets severely injured in battle. Her HP is lower than that of a Fighter, but she can wield the Polearm and Great Sword

Name: Battle Smith Idge
Introduction: Idge, Enhance Merchant of Cite de Reboldoeux. She was once simply an average woman, but was attracted by the exploration on the New Continent. She began enhancing armor after witnessing a person gets severely injured in battle. Her HP is lower than that of a Fighter, but she can wield the Polearm and Great Sword

Name: Brunie Etienne
Introduction: Brunie Etienne, Treasure Hunter and Residential Manager of Cite de Reboldoeux. She possesses every Pistol stance and attacks enemies with high speed. She can use the exclusive skill Fatal Blues.

Name: Battlefield Claude Baudez
Introduction: Claude Baudez during his golden years as a famous mercenary. He has a specialized combat style built around Polearms. His great combat skills are said to strike fear in his enemies.

Name: Asoka
Introduction: Mysterious swordwoman who came from far east island, to test the limits of sword skills. Cold-hearted and self-respecting Asoka never shows mercy to her enemies.

Name: Soho
Introduction: Soho, a part of the second generation of Coimbrans. He has a large store of SP and is also adept at physical attacks. He can use Fortitudo and Escrima.

Name: Soho The Wind
Introduction: Soho, a part of the second generation of Coimbrans. He has a large store of SP and is also adept at physical attacks. He can use Fortitudo and Escrima.

Name: Lisa Lynway
Introduction: Lisa Lynway, the owner of the Sea Elephant Cafe in the Port of Coimbra. She is a charming lady, and is part of the second generation of Coimbrans. She uses a Dagger stance, and attacks with great speed. She has a high Critical Rate.

Name: Sage Emilia Guliano
Introduction: She is searching for her father. Her abilities include First-Aid and ESP, and her exclusive skill is 'Healing.'

Name: Grace Bernelli
Introduction: Grace Bernelli, an Intelligence Officer from the Bristian Army. She is currently investigating what she believes to be a plot of Vespanola. She has skills more advanced that those of Musketeers, and has a special stance for using Shotguns.

Name: Sniper Bernelli
Introduction: Young Bernelli, when she did activities as sniper. Says she had an excellent skill of shooting but had trouble with hiding by her white hair.

Name: Pirate Adelina Esperanza
Introduction: Adelina Esperanza, a former pirate captain. She is looking for the traitor who killed her comrades on their way to the New Continent. She has average Attack but high Attack Speed. One of her stances allows her to use the sabre and pistol simultaneously.

Name: Calyce
Introduction: Belongs to the second generation of the Granado Espada settlers. Orphaned at an early age, she wandered the streets of Auch, before being adopted by a secret organization. She became the youngest crossbow champion in the syndicate, at the age of fifteen. Calyce left the organization soon after, and established herself as a mercenary for hire. Her Eye of Cat scans and determines enemy weaknesses.

Name: City of Auch Infantry
Introduction: Soldier responsible for the security in Auch. He uses stances related to Rifles and has the unique skill, Concentration.

Name: Claire
Introduction: The second generation of Granado Espada settlers. Nobody knows of her origin, only that she was raised by different guardians during her childhood. Interested in trying her hand at everything, but has not particularly done well at anything.

Name: Cannon Shooter Claire
Introduction: Claire at the age of 17; she has tried handling more graceful weapons but eventually chose a cannon. She learned how to handle the cannon by using the equipment called [Cartridge] through training in order to double the weapon's power and speed.

Name: Lorch Furuhollen
Introduction: Lorch Furuhollen is a descendant of a distinguished Vespanolan family. He adores powerful firearms and has devoted himself to creating a powerful gun

Name: Karjalainen
Introduction: She has a dream of being the best designer. She can use a rapier and magic.

Name: Viki
Introduction: An adorable boy who lives with his grandfather and uses scout and summon skills.

Name: Catherine Strength
Introduction: The daughter of Dr.Torsche. She died when she was just a child but Dr.Torsche created an automated robot to resurrect her (STR). She can use most stances. She has the exclusive skill, Doll Dream.

Name: Catherine Dexterity
Introduction: The daughter of Dr.Torsche. She died when she was just a child but Dr.Torsche created an automated robot to resurrect her (DEX). She can use most stances. She has the exclusive skill, Doll Dream.

Name: Catherine Intelligence
Introduction: The daughter of Dr.Torsche. She died when she was just a child but Dr.Torsche created an automated robot to resurrect her (INT). She can use most stances. She has the exclusive skill, Doll Dream.

Name: Rescue Knight
Introduction: The Rescue Knights are a neutral force that protects and aids injured pioneers. They use Defending Guard and Defending Shot stance.

Name: Romina
Introduction: Captain Romina of Rescue Knights in Ustiur. She was born in the New Continent and is dissatisfied with the Mainland. She can use Defending Guard and Defending Shot stances with a sword and a shield. she can use the exclusive skill Resuscitation.

Name: Gavin Jameson
Introduction: Garcia hails from Bristia and was also the 2nd Lieutenant of the Bristia Special Army. Since he is under the impression that Edward was murdered by Montoro, he swears to take revenge for his brother by traveling to the New World. He is capable of using rapier-related skills. He also has the exclusive skill: Shadow Trigger.

Name: Edward Hingis
Introduction: Having most of his memory wiped due to brutal experiments, he became one of the strongest Burlons in the cohort. He is said to have the power similar to the Nameless Person and the ability to summon a Grim-ripper.

Name: Selva Norte
Introduction: A settler from Bristia who lost her left hand and lover to Viscount Montoro. Will her obsession with legacy of Feruccio be requited with the death of Montoro and the restoration of her hand?

Name: Reckless Emilia
Introduction: Emilia, who excessively tested the power of constellation, awakened the dark side of her soul, which had been dormant for the last 20 years. What will she do in the chaotic continent, with her reckless desires in full manifestation?

Name: Ania
Introduction: Ania lost her parents in the explosion of Errac, and all that emotion and depression just turned inward. One day, a man came to Errac and said 'Forgive me..', and that instant her pent up sadness just burst forth. Years later, Ania and Nar became warriors of the town.

Name: Hellena
Introduction: Hellena joined the sinister espionage organization of Duke Felipe for the sake of her ailing mother. She soared through the ranks with her inherent affinity for magic, and was eventually promoted to an assistant troupe leader. Will you help her achieve the future she deserves?

Name: Catherine Torsche
Introduction: One and only daughter of Dr.Torsche. She was kidnapped by Hernandez, the secondary leader of Ten Nobles, and was presumed dead. She was brainwashed to be loyal to Duke Felipe, and raised as an assassin.

Name: Marie
Introduction: She is a daughter of the maid leader who worked for Dr.Torsche when he was in Vespanola

Name: Valeria
Introduction: The twin younger sister of Princess Gabriella, who was held in a state of suspended animation at the deepest part of Jaquin. After her rescue, she is learning about the world but still has a long way to go. She can use the Ancient Restoring Stance, which has been awakened by her pure soul.

Name: Valeria Vandetta
Introduction: A figure of Valeria who has vanished her innocent by knowing her origin and conspiracies. The only remained things for her are hatred and voidness to her father.

Name: Cadet Elisa
Introduction: She is a nurse officer in the 2nd fleet and helping lots of things to Castilla exploration. Lots of fleet soldiers are faithful with her.

Name: Cadet Adriana
Introduction: Daughter of a new noble in Vespanola. She became the youngest admiral due to her contribution in the Naval Battle and many other sea battle. She is dispatched for a special fleet for Castilla exploration.

Name: Raven
Introduction: A butler for Lucifer castle of Montoro, who worked as a spy officer for Bristia but was caught by Montoro after the Three-Year War and now works for him. He has strong animosity towards Montoro, but he looks like he is satisfied with his work.

Name: Grandies
Introduction: A clone of Grandma, the Queen of Pioneering that is created as a result of endless experiment by Montoro.

Name: Queen of Pioneering Grandma
Introduction: A portrait of Grandies when she was pioneering in the front line while she left Claire with Claude. People praised her calling her Queen of Pioneering.

Name: Daria
Introduction: Daria bacame the youngest woman officer at 19. Since she lost her father at a young age, she always took care of younger sister. Worried about her sister who left for the new continent without saying anything, she took a long journey and came to new continent. When she was young because of the discrimination by men, she is hostile towards men.

Name: Natalie
Introduction: Natalie is confident about her older sister who studied the elite course and became a soldier, however, she also feels inferior because of which. Due to her feelings, she left her country and joined Rescue Knights in new continent.

Name: Veronif
Introduction: Veronif is an alchemist from Vespanola. She really hates all the new continent pioneers, from the inner depths of her heart, since her ex-boyfriend broke up with her and left for the new continent.

Name: Eva Sharon
Introduction: One of the ten nobles, Count Cortes' secretary. Very loyal to Cortes, and would do anything for him, even If blood is shed on one's hands.

Name: Lionel
Introduction: Elite officer from Vespanola. Currently working in Viron and a popular guy on the island. He has mastered military science, and is an expert in squad battle.

Name: Ludin
Introduction: The younger sister of Leonele, Ludin. She is a bit disrespectful since she is pampered but, her real personality is kind and shy. Come to new continent to meet her brother, Leonele, who did not see her for a long time.

Name: Student President Ludin
Introduction: 16-year-old Ludin is the student president of the prestigious private school in Vespanola. She dosen't work at all but seems to have no problem, owing to the capable vice president.

Name: Beatrice
Introduction: She is Absinian, the real sister of M'Boma and she was an excellent woman warrior since she was young. Recently, she left her hometown and met her brother while wandering around the world and came to the new continent together.

Name: Selene
Introduction: One who used to be a maid of Novia. But because of Selene's ineptitude, Novia threw her out and turned her into an ice sculpture. Eventually, Selene was able to free herself, but at the cost of her power. Unable to return to Novia, Selene wandered aimlessly..

Name: Snowflake Cherlyn
Introduction: She was under Hernandez' command and in charge of collecting unique phenomenon and items going through Granado Espada. She didn't think to have a feud with Family, so she joined with them.

Name: Rose the Spirit
Introduction: A Homunculus that Montoro made with Rose as a medium. After the death of Montoro, to know the reason why she exists, she started to be with the Pioneer Family.

Name: JD
Introduction: A member of a family of Knights that served Kielce for a long time. Due to an incident, he abandoned his name and country and joined Blood Navy. JD stands for Judgenment Day, his code name in Blood Navy.

Name: Cano
Introduction: She was commissioned as an officer for the Bloody Navy despite her young age due to her special magic. In contrast to her flashy ability, she is careful and timid. She is quite mature for her age.

Name: Heyran
Introduction: An ex-officer of Bristia Army. She now disguises as a Madame of the Red Hat, Bristia's most fancy pub. She is popular with the customers for her carefree and composed personality.

Name: Veil
Introduction: He is the one who has constructed Resistance leading the remnants to the woods after the Bristia's defeat in the Three-Year War. He is impetuous and likes to receive attentions. According to rumors, he was promoted to captain rapidly by his achievement that he did to look cool during the Three-Year War.

Name: Spy Olivia
Introduction: The Governor of Bristia, Caisse's adjutant. Her real identity is a spy from Blood Navy in a command of Renauld. She was supporting Caisse behind to achieve her objectives. Since she can't return to the troops because of some series of cases, she joins the family to achieve her objectives.

Name: Caisse
Introduction: The new Governor of Bristia. He has succeeded to step forward for an independence of his country through his calculating acts. He has a special talent about using guns and also has understanding of various combat tactics.

Name: Illusion
Introduction: Another Guardian of Kielche who protect the dark and dangerous night street of Kielche. People who watched saying that it was like an fantastic magic show.

Name: Rachel Sheffield
Introduction: She is a senhorita of the upper class of Bristia and a best friend of Ludin's. She travels to the new continent to find Ludin. Her beautiful Illusion Gunner uses a pistol and a magic scroll.

Name: Ralph
Introduction: Ralph is an Intelligence Officer from Vespanola who was dispatched to investigate a situation in the new continent.

Name: Elizabeth
Introduction: She became a famous painter of reputation for quite a young age. Because she don't know much of the world yet, so, she don't know well about her reputation, and she just paint hard due to be happy to see the look of people who love to see her pictures. Even if she already got many of great works, there are no less mess works that people would say 'What the hell!'. It seems her talent is unstable according to her mood and physical condition.

Name: Sierra Rose
Introduction: The last key for the 5 Elementals bequeathed by Ferruccio Espada. She is a little witch who are embracing Corazon. She still cannot control her power on her own will.

Name: Nena
Introduction: Last survivor of Vigilar tribe who protected for ages. Oneday after Lorenzo showed up in Bahamar, Vigilar tribe disappeard but meet Nena, the last Guardian of Forest in the mean time of solving the secret of 5 Elements.

Name: Sirius
Introduction: A crusader of Armonia. He lost his parents at an early age and was raised in the monastery of Armonia. He rose through the rank of deputy leader of the crusaders through his firm conviction and talent in battle. He believes his sacred duty from God is to purify the herd of Abyss.

Name: Lora Constans
Introduction: Captain of the Armonia Guard to escort a high-ranking members including the Pope, Saint. Her Bullets receiving the Divine Protection deal a greater blow to evil followers. She was sweet and warm but she became to ignore everyone at a moment.

Name: Juliana Constans
Introduction: Lora Constans's younger sister. She is a member of Armonia Crusaders. In 2nd Holy War, She carried out her miission that had to make spare time for the main force that retreated by Abyss army. Armonia main force was possible to retreat Apostadero safely but all of the defence forces was exterminated.

Name: Berthe and Charles
Introduction: Memento Mori as Van's shadow. She was supposed to be a saint but by the conspiracy of church, took her voice and expelled to underground. Afterwards, she became Memento Mori by the help of Van and got the ability to summon dead people and resist against darkness of Armonia. Charles that is the skull and accompanied by her all the time, speak things instead of her.

Name: Anis
Introduction: Current Armonia Saint. Originally she was a normal girl but after Ornella had been dead, she became a Saint. A friend of Sirius and Cepheus.

Name: Cecille
Introduction: Hunter hunting in the area around Armonia. She uses a bow as her main weapon. Her excellent ability to tame the beast as well as archery skills makes her certainly to knock the prey with 'Grey', her wolf domesticated for a long time.

Name: Loreta
Introduction: Without a regular job, she lives on rewards for treating all the requests about fight, protecting or getting rid of someone mainly around Coimbra.

Name: Mireille
Introduction: When she was in trouble in Armonia woods, the man in black hood helped her. After repeated training, she could finally get the ability to dexterously use a sword and goes on a journey to find him.

Name: Black Wing Judith
Introduction: She abandoned her wealthy family and entered in the Armonian Order, then became a 'Judge'. 'Judge' is used to be called as a shadow of Armonia and a holy knight who is working missions secretly.

Name: Lorraine
Introduction: She is mademoiselle of the family, Ilie Baselrane, older sister of twins. Comparing with Dolores, she's got calm personality. She likes to have a tea time with Rev and Dolores together, but Dolores seems to have in mind of that. She is always used to sigh after clearing incidents from Dolores.

Name: Dolores
Introduction: She is mademoiselle of the family, Ilie Baselrane, younger sister of twins. Now, she goes to a private school in Vespanola and is called a brilliant mind with a great brains and talent in her classroom, but because of her playful personality with no evil intention, she is used to make a trouble a lot. And In the place of those accidents, Hare is always with her.

Name: Silver Flash Lynn
Introduction: The knight family, Herberthe has protected Iiller imperial for generations, and she was a second daughter. Everybody expected that she would be the imperial guard, but she bow took a vow to the little princess of the Vernier. She followed her master when the little princess entered Vespanola, and since she overwhelmed the Vespanola knights who looked down on the little princess, she made a big name.

Name: Codename L
Introduction: When Leona worked in Stratavista, she did active work as a Code Name L, and it is said that she assassinated the ruling classes for each country with her silent and agile movement. She has focused on only her missions because she believed that it was the only way to fulfill 'Bloody Revenge'.

Name: Risky
Introduction: One of many descendants of the head of Arsene. She was an orphan, the head of Arsene adaopted her and gave her name, Risky. Her main mission was a stealing information from high class ministers. So she couldn't use weapons during her missions, that was the reason she learned the card magic from the head of Arsene.

Name: Cadet Amy
Introduction: A cadet in 'Illisia' military academy. She is used to make embarrass other people around because of her freewheeling personality, but is always on the top in every traning evaluation also. People usually call her as 'Blone Witch of Shausen'.

Name: Consol Dietrich
Introduction: The head of Evora warlord and current Illier imperial guard commander. According to the idea of the past consul, Machia, she is trying hard to develop her country. She knows how to see the flow of the world, and how to manage people. She is praised as the best commander by Iller people.

Name: Battle Cook Panfilo de Narvaez
Introduction: Panfilo de Narvaez, the talented chef of Cite de Reboldoeux aspires to conjure world-renowned dishes with ingredients from the New Continent. Reboldoeux is his first stop for his culinary experiments. He uses a sword and a Bracelet of Fire with the Flame-guard stance.
